医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
保护性基因变异可保护美国黑人免受肾病风险哥伦比亚大学研究人员的一项新研究发现，许多被认为患肾病高风险的美国黑人拥有一种保护性基因变异，可以消除额外的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Protective-genic-variant-shields-Black-Americans-from-kidney-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Protective-genic-variant-shields-Black-Americans-from-kidney-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41a19f45-f373-43d3-bf16-83857c953d1c Tue, 12 Dec 2023 23:43:46 -0500 Protective genetic variant shields Black Americans from kidney disease risk
OHSU 研究揭示细菌感染过程中的泛素修饰俄勒冈健康与科学大学的一项新研究有一天可能会带来预防或治疗与所有人类细胞中发现的一种蛋白质有关的疾病和感染的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/OHSU-study-sheds-light-on-ubiquitin-modification-during-bacterial-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/OHSU-study-sheds-light-on-ubiquitin-modification-during-bacterial-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f267a48-2361-403b-b444-f90d4c233705 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 23:34:06 -0500 OHSU study sheds light on ubiquitin modification during bacterial infection
简单的眼部测试可发现患者术后认知功能障碍的风险从字面上看，识别出有术后认知功能障碍风险的老年患者可能在眨眼之间就完成了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Simple-eye-test-spots-病人-at-risk-for-postoperative-cognitive-dysfunction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Simple-eye-test-spots-病人-at-risk-for-postoperative-cognitive-dysfunction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14a1fbd7-b5a3-40ed-8d2f-3a44ad4ed144 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 23:29:15 -0500 Simple eye test spots patients at risk for postoperative cognitive dysfunction
美国退伍军人的研究揭示了对长期新冠病毒和疫苗接种的保护作用的重要见解研究调查了美国退伍军人 COVID-19 后病情 (PCC) 的临床特征和趋势，显示了疫苗接种的保护作用以及有效研究和临床护理所需的精确症状记录的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/US-veterans-study-reveals-key-insights-into-Long-COVID-and-protective-role-of-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/US-veterans-study-reveals-key-insights-into-Long-COVID-and-protective-role-of-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a2eb71b-eca1-4403-aabf-a678919ebfd1 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 23:05:00 -0500 U.S. veterans' study reveals key insights into Long COVID and protective role of vaccination
干细胞治疗试验显示了心力衰竭再生治疗的希望梅奥诊所的研究人员和国际合作者在一项后期多国临床试验中发现，干细胞疗法可以改善晚期心力衰竭患者的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Stem-cell-therapy-trial-shows-promise-for-rgenesis-treatment-of-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Stem-cell-therapy-trial-shows-promise-for-rgenesis-treatment-of-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34719cc9-9850-4e0e-ad2d-dd2741ebc25e Tue, 12 Dec 2023 22:56:31 -0500 Stem cell therapy trial shows promise for regenerative treatment of heart failure
研究人员发现对抗侵袭性淋巴瘤的强大组合武器德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员表示，伊布替尼和维奈托克的靶向治疗组合显着改善了复发/难治性套细胞淋巴瘤 (MCL) 患者的无进展生存期 (PFS)，并实现了 82% 的总体缓解率中心。 III 期 SYMPATICO 试验的结果已在 2023 年美国血液学会 (ASH) 年会上公布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Researchers-find-powerful-combo-weapon-against-aggressive-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Researchers-find-powerful-combo-weapon-against-aggressive-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a1f6696-db95-4116-adf3-6d862824141d Tue, 12 Dec 2023 22:51:51 -0500 Researchers find powerful combo weapon against aggressive lymphoma
Brainoware：一种突破性的人工智能方法，使用大脑类器官进行高级计算《自然电子学》杂志的研究推出了“Brainoware”，这是一种创新的人工智能硬件方法，使用大脑类器官神经网络来执行语音识别和非线性动态预测等复杂任务，展示了人工智能开发的巨大潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Brainoware-A-breakthrough-AI-approach-using-brain-organoids-for-advanced-computation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Brainoware-A-breakthrough-AI-approach-using-brain-organoids-for-advanced-computation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5ecaeaf-8677-461e-ab40-45084f7b7a66 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 22:41:00 -0500 Brainoware: A breakthrough AI approach using brain organoids for advanced computation
揭露女性退伍军人在寻求心理健康支持时面临的障碍根据今天（12 月 13 日星期三）在剑桥举行的一次会议上讨论的新研究，身份问题、男性主导的品牌以及担心自己的需求得不到满足是女性无法获得退伍军人心理健康支持的原因之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Unmasking-the-barriers-faced-by-women-veterans-in-seeking-mental-health-support.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Unmasking-the-barriers-faced-by-women-veterans-in-seeking-mental-health-support.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c1a590b-0766-4d64-8abb-0d99d908f744 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 22:31:38 -0500 Unmasking the barriers faced by women veterans in seeking mental health support
多囊卵巢综合症患者通过治疗可以达到相同的出生率昆士兰大学的研究人员发现，患有多囊卵巢综合症 (PCOS) 的女性对生育治疗反应良好，并且出生率与未患有多囊卵巢综合症的女性相同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/PCOS-病人-can-achieve-same-birth-rates-with-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/PCOS-病人-can-achieve-same-birth-rates-with-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7a345b8-23fb-4b3e-b6a1-60402b96082d Tue, 12 Dec 2023 21:59:57 -0500 PCOS patients can achieve same birth rates with treatment
Tat-热休克蛋白10可以使衰老的大脑恢复活力一篇新的研究论文发表在 Aging（被 MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 的“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 22 期，题为“Tat-heat shock Protein 10 ameliorates Age”通过促进神经元可塑性和减少海马体中与年龄相关的基因来实现相关表型。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Tat-heat-shock- Protein-10-could-rejuvenate-aging-brains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Tat-heat-shock- Protein-10-could-rejuvenate-aging-brains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d001370a-966e-48a7-9509-f5db8be5acf0 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 21:53:24 -0500 Tat-heat shock protein 10 could rejuvenate aging brains
